messages.subject: URGENT TAKEDOWN REQUEST
messages.message:
We are contacting you to request an immediate takedown request of the 2 x URLs listed above.
The webpages contain personal, confidential and sensitive information which places places individuals at risk of serious harm. Law enforcement authorities are also aware and may be in touch with you imminently.
Please acknowledge receipt and immediately take down the 2 x URLs (and any other similar URLs) as soon as possible.
Thank you for your support and cooperation.

Yours faithfully,
Clyde

Thank you for your very prompt response Julien.

We appreciate your cooperation including the blurring of the image file at this URL: https://images.ransomware.live/screenshots/posts/8c89cd29c62c2c31e65d95056560db7f.png 
Given the threat to life and the very difficult circumstances at play here, and the ongoing involvement of the NCA and NCSC including related investigations, we would be extremely grateful if you could also take the following steps immediately:
remove all references to JLA (and Embargo) at this URL: https://www.ransomware.live/#/recent; and
remove the function (shown under the camera icon and the eyes image) to link to the Embargo leak site post (which is now blurred) at this URL: https://images.ransomware.live/screenshots/posts/8c89cd29c62c2c31e65d95056560db7f.png 
Please acknowledge receipt.
Kind regards.
Ian
